summary: Adds a light armor version of original Daedric.
descriptionHtml: This is light Daedric armor, the first mod I ever made. This is similar to my other mod Heavy Armor Converted to Light, but this is only Daedric. There should be three pairs in Breezehome, but if there isn\\\'t, you can craft it. You need the Daedric Smithing perk to craft and upgrade. Available on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=84767908&tscn=1343760270 Facebook: www.facebook.com/JewelMods
author: Jewel
